Text.Dungeon: If you have 1 or more Wounds, draw 1 card.
Text.Village: If you have 1 or more Wounds, draw 1 card.
After you complete your Village Phase, you may take a Dungeon Phase.  If you do, you may not move out of The Wilderness.

Text.All: After buying a card, you may destroy 1 (and only 1) Dagger.
Text.Dungeon: If wielded by a level 0 Hero, draw 1 card

Text.All: (Adventurers have no Class, and thus may level into an level 1 Hero.)
Once per turn, after a die is rolled, you may reroll the die (before it resolves).  If you do, discard Bree unless you have Joba.

Location.Spoils: Level up 1 Hero, paying Thunderstone costs. If they are level 0, instead pay 0 Thunderstones

Text.All: +2 light if the Guardian is revealed
Text.Dungeon: If you have a Wound, draw 1 card. If you have 4 or fewer HP, you may heal 1 Wound instead.

Text.All: Once per turn, after a die is rolled, you may reroll the die (before it resolves).  If you do, discard Bree unless you have Joba.

Location.Spoils: Level up 1 Hero, paying Thunderstone costs. If they are level 0, instead pay 0 Thunderstones

Text.All: +1 light if the Guardian is revealed.
Text.Spoils: If you are in a Party, gain 1 Thunderstone or heal 1 would (token).

1.text: Stormhand's Edged Weapons have -1 skill value
